description: The graphics are a cute mix of smooth animation and blockyness. Fun short little game in which you try to run your giraffe as far as you can through the savannah.
eat or slow down lions - your choice

I think I relate a lot to this app about eating fruits and beating lions with fruits, I do that a lot in my daily life and I'm happy to see an app that shows how hard beating lions with fruits is. Thank you! 10/10 would play again.

This is an entertaining piece of software this game should be worth 60$
I play this a lot. like a lot
i used to play this game for relaxation after coding for a long time.

There should be some stuff for buying. For example 1 fruit gives 1 coin, and for 100000 coins you could buy a random costume but please make it so there is 10% chance or less of it giving duplicates. You could also make it so it has a buying mechanic like the game snail ride on google play store. I hope you add something for buying. Also there is no need for coins. Fruit can be coins.

Endlich mal wieder ein Mini-Game, das überzeugt. Simpel gehalten, aber in sich perfekt. Prompte Steuerung, intuitives Spielsystem. Angenehme Musik und passende Grafik. Kein zu hoher Suchtfaktor. Perfekt für die Pause zwischendurch.

description: Je trouve qu'il faudrait pouvoir mettre en pleine écran

I think it's a really good game and has even more potential please consider adding :
-Cosmetic items/Friends for the giraffe purchasable with the fruits collected
-Add an off switch with keys from the keyboard, having to consistently press the mouse button gets tiring on a laptop
-Adding themes
-Add an online worldwide record ?

Anyway it's a really fun game nonetheless

Nice arcade game.
However, the controls are a bit confusing at first. I think it's worth writing a little tutorial or help at the very beginning of the game.
I think it's worth writing a small module so that the game can be stretched to full screen.
I think you could write some giraffe skins and some more fun scripts.
an exciting arcade game, although you can play for a maximum of an hour. then the toy gets bored.
